title: The Lion King: Timon and Pumbaa
creator_credit: Walt Disney Pictures, Tony Craig, Bobs Gannaway, Rob LaDuca, Steve Moore and Jeff DeGrandis
brief_description: The Lion King’s lovable pals Timon and Pumbaa enjoy starring roles in their first solo video. Pumbaa is struck by lightning and as a result develops amnesia and has no recollection of his friend Timon and the adventures they have shared. Timon tries his hardest to restore his friends memory, and recalls some of their adventures around the world.
